Text: do you have the dharmah bums  by any chance

I created these files from a seven cassette book on tape I got from my library; I wanted to be able to listen to the book on my Ipod rather than switching tapes every 40 min. (yes, i'm that lazy).  I've never created/uploaded a torrent before and this seemed like it would make a fun experiment...I just opened the torrent from a second computer in my house and IT WORKS!!  If you want, I can make a Dharma Bums file...this may take a few days, I have to see if my library has the book on tape; if not I will have to order it from another library.  Check back periodically--this is so exciting!!!  :D
Just uploaded a torrent for Dharma Bums  :)

I'm going inpatient rehab tomorrow morning for at least the next 30 days so my computer will be off (not able to seed).  I hope these files have spread enough by now so that I am not the only source; if not, I am sorry and I will be back and seeding in about 30 days -- I HOPE  :-/
Wow, thanks man! Thanks for makin' MY time at the rehab a lot easier. (In Sweden we are alowed to bring our computers :D)
Got out of rehab last week and I am seeding again :)
Can anyone tell me who is reading this please?

Has anyone else found that this skips in parts? Is it possible to fix it, or does anyone have a version that doesn't skip? Thanks!! I really like the way it's read, and would love to have a perfect copy.
